content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Mining and Smelting Complex at (-28, -61)
- Burner mining drill at (-28, -61) mining iron ore
- Burner mining drill at (1, -60) mining iron ore with wooden chest at (1.5, -58.5) storing iron ore
- Stone furnace at (2, -56) smelting iron ore to plates
- Burner inserter at (1.5, -57.5) moving items from chest to furnace

### Copper Mining and Smelting Complex at (-27, -59)
- Burner mining drill at (-28, -61) mining copper ore
- Stone furnace at (-27, -59) smelting copper ore to plates
- Burner inserter at (-25.5, -58.5) moving items
- Wooden chest at (-26.5, -57.5) for storage

### Smelting Array at (1, 1)
Multiple furnaces and inserter-chest combinations:
- Stone furnaces at (1, 1), (3, 1)
- Wooden chests at (1.5, 3.5), (3.5, 3.5), (5.5, 3.5)
- Burner inserters at (1.5, 2.5), (3.5, 2.5), (5.5, 2.5)

### Production Complex at (14.5, 14.5)
- Assembling machine at (14.5, 14.5) for copper cable production
- Multiple wooden chests at (11.5, 14.5), (17.5, 14.5) for storage
- Burner inserters at (12.5, 14.5), (16.5, 14.5) for material movement

### Electronic Circuit Production at (21.5, 15.5)
- Assembling machine at (21.5, 15.5)
- Wooden chest at (24.5, 15.5) storing electronic circuits
- Burner inserters at (19.5, 15.5), (23.5, 15.5)

### Water and Steam System
- Offshore pumps at (-7.5, 25.5), (2.5, 34.5), (2.5, 36.5)
- Boiler at (18, 47.5)
- Steam engine at (29.5, 51.5)
- Multiple pipe groups connecting the system

### Transport System
Multiple belt groups creating logistics network between production facilities:
- Main belt line from (5.5, 8.5) to (14.5, 4.5)
- Secondary belt systems connecting various production facilities
- Multiple inserter-chest combinations for item transfer

# ERROR TIPS

### Crafting errors
- When crafting items that require smelting (like iron plates), ensure you have access to a furnace and the required raw materials
- Check recipe requirements before attempting to craft items

### Connection errors
- When connecting entities with pipes, ensure you have the required pipe items in your inventory
- Plan pipe connections before placing water-steam infrastructure

### Power network issues
- Multiple entities showing "not receiving electricity" - ensure power poles are properly connected and there is sufficient power generation
- Steam engine showing "not connected to power network" - verify power pole connections

### Fluid system warnings
- Multiple "No fluid present in connections" warnings - ensure proper pipe connections between water sources, boilers, and steam engines
- Check that offshore pumps are properly connected to the pipe network

### Production facility issues
- Assembling machines showing "missing resources" - ensure proper supply chain of materials
- Check inserter placement and direction for proper material flow into assembling machines
